comment.author: 15828730@N05
comment._content: The Boeing F4B was a single seat biplane fighter, this appears to be an FF-1, a two seat fighter. The first fighter to be built by Grumman for the US Navy. Forty of these machines, built under license by The Canadian Car & Foundry Company, were smuggled to Spain and used by the Republican Air Force in their civil war starting in 1937.
